src_original: katame ṣaṭ? tadyathā - cakṣurvijñānam /  śrotravijñānam /  ghrāṇavijñānam /  jihvāvijñānam /  kāyavijñānam /  manovijñānam /  ime ṣaḍ vijñānakāyāḥ //
(ī) vijñānapratyayaṃ nāmarūpamiti /  tatra nāmarūpam - nāma catvāro 'rūpiṇaḥ skandhāḥ /
vedanāskandhaḥ /  saṃjñāskandhaḥ /  saṃskāraskandhaḥ /  vijñānaskandhaḥ /  idaṃ (AvSū, Vaidya 313) nāma /
idamucyate ṣaḍāyatanam //  (ū) ṣaḍāyatanapratyayaḥ sparśa iti /  sparśaḥ katamaḥ?
